attributes.action: NHS WORKERS SHOULD BE PAID MORE ESPECIALLY AFTER ALL THEY HEVE BEEN THROUGH
attributes.additional_details:
Then annually they should be given a pay rise of 2 percent above inflation year on year.
To pay for this all individuals except NHS workers who earn £75k should pay an extra 0.5 to 1pct additional income tax. This should be segmented so that it cannot be used for anything else except NHS pay,
It is the human thing to do after all they have been through.
attributes.background: As the NHS workers are the most important dedicated individuals we have in the UK they should be given a 3 percent pay rise now for those earning less than £50000.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253

Provide a Pay increase of 7% to all our NHS workers fighting COVID19
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/568373

Support NHS staff with a pay rise this year of 3% or more: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578071

Automatic Yearly Pay Rise For NHS Health Care Workers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565256
